ActJudges Act
SubjectGwyneth Lamperson ** WIDOW'S ANNUITY ** The Hon. George W. Lamperson Effective: December 11, 2009
PrecisGranting of an annuity to GWYNETH LAMPERSON, widow of the Hon. George W. Lamperson, a Judge of the Supreme Court of British Columbia, effective December 11, 2009.
AttachmentsAttachment
